ru.jango.j0loader.queue

Interface Queue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultQueue, SingleURIQueue

    public interface Queue
    Base interface for queueing Request objects for loaders. Used directly in DataLoader.createQueue() as a part of Iterator pattern.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Request request)
      Adds a Request into queue.
      void addAll(java.util.Collection<? extends Request> requests)
      Adds all Requests into queue.
      void clear()
      Removes all elements from queue.
      boolean contains(Request request)
      Checks if a certain request is in queue.
      Request current()
      Returns current element (witch is being processed now) or null.
      int indexOf(Request request)
      Searches the queue for the specified Request and returns the index of the first occurrence.
      int indexOf(java.net.URI uri)
      Searches the queue for the specified Request by it's URI and returns the index of the first occurrence.
      boolean insert(int pos, Request request)
      Inserts a Request into the specified position.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the queue is empty.
      Request next()
      Returns next Request in queue, or null.
      Request remove()
      Removes next Request from queue.
      Request remove(int index)
      Removes a Request from queue at a specified index.
      boolean remove(Request request)
      Removes a certain Request from queue.
      int size()
      Returns current size of the queue.

    • Method Detail

      • current

        Request current()
        Returns current element (witch is being processed now) or null.

      • next

        Request next()
        Returns next Request in queue, or null. Also removes returned request from queue.

      • remove

        Request remove()
        Removes next Request from queue.

      • remove

        Request remove(int index)
        Removes a Request from queue at a specified index.

      • remove

        boolean remove(Request request)
        Removes a certain Request from queue. If a queue contains more than one pointer to the same Request object, all of them will be removed.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the queue was modified

      • add

        void add(Request request)
        Adds a Request into queue.

      • addAll

        void addAll(java.util.Collection<? extends Request> requests)
        Adds all Requests into queue.

      • insert

        boolean insert(int pos,
             Request request)
        Inserts a Request into the specified position.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns current size of the queue.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the queue is empty.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all elements from queue.

      • contains

        boolean contains(Request request)
        Checks if a certain request is in queue.

      • indexOf

        int indexOf(Request request)
        Searches the queue for the specified Request and returns the index of the first occurrence.
        Parameters:
        request - the Request to search for
        Returns:
        found index or -1

      • indexOf

        int indexOf(java.net.URI uri)
        Searches the queue for the specified Request by it's URI and returns the index of the first occurrence.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to search for
        Returns:
        found index or -1
